data.title: The 2022 Godkin Lecture with Governor Charlie Baker
data.meta_description: Join us in the John F. Kennedy Jr. Forum for the Edwin L. Godkin Lecture delivered by Charlie Baker, 72nd governor of Massachusetts, and co-hosted by the Taubman Center for State and Local Government, the Rappaport Institute for Greater Boston, and the Institute of Politics. The Godkin Lecture will focus on the essentials of democratic governance and the duties of the citizen. Registration for this event is now closed. You can follow this event using the livestream above or on our YouTube, Twitter, or Facebook pages.
data.text:
Join us in the John F. Kennedy Jr. Forum for the Edwin L. Godkin Lecture delivered by Charlie Baker, 72nd governor of Massachusetts, and co-hosted by the Taubman Center for State and Local Government, the Rappaport Institute for Greater Boston, and the Institute of Politics. The Godkin Lecture will focus on the essentials of democratic governance and the duties of the citizen.

Registration for this event is now closed. You can follow this event using the livestream above or on our YouTube, Twitter, or Facebook pages.
